name: VersaPay - Email - Could not send payment from NetSuite to VersaPay
content:
You are receiving this email because a customer payment has been entered into NetSuite that can not be sent to VersaPay. The Payor is not the same for every invoice in the apply list. Please review the list of items in the apply list to make sure that everything is correct (particularly the Billing Responsible Party field for Invoices) and make any necessary changes in NetSuite.

As a reminder, payments are stored under the Billing Responsible Party in VersaPay so that customers can not see what Partners paid to Rapid7 for services/products. This means that all invoices must have the same payor when included on the same payment.
